availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James H. Embry (Madison County, Kentucky, attorney and judge)

body.p: Madison County, Kentucky, attorney and judge. Kentucky native. Son of Bowling Embry and Louisa Embry. Married Eliza Pierce Embry in Mason County, Kentucky, on June 12, 1855. Attorney in Davidson County, Tennessee in 1850. Practicing law in Madison County, Kentucky, in 1860. County judge in Madison County, Kentucky, in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Davidson County, District 19, p. 184.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Madison County, First Division, p. 418.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Mason County Marriages, Film 000281844, p.399.
KYR-0001-019-0092.
